ing: 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or more to taste
des: "This tangy remoulade-style sandwich spread adds a creamy and flavorful kick to ordinary sandwiches."
ins: Combine cream cheese, sour cream, Dijon mustard, mayonnaise, horseradish, garlic powder, onion powder, lemon juice, cayenne pepper, and salt in a large bowl. Beat with an electric mixer until smooth. Season with additional salt if needed. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour.
